headlines.description: An Anthony Martial hat trick saw Manchester United close the gap on the Premier League top four to just two points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martial hits three as Man Utd close on top four

headlines.description: Ahmed El Mohamady scored with seven minutes remaining to give Aston Villa a potential lifeline from relegation in a draw vs. Newcastle United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aston Villa fight back to draw with Newcastle

headlines.description: A second-half header by Michael Keane gave Everton a 1-0 away win against bottom side Norwich City in the Premier League on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Keane goal gives Everton 1-0 win over rudderless Norwich

headlines.description: Another episode of the Adama Traore-Raul Jimenez show delivered Wolverhampton Wanderers a precious 1-0 win over struggling Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jimenez-Traore show seals win for Wolves

headlines.description: Liverpool moved within two points of the Premier League title after returning to their irrepressible best to beat Crystal Palace 4-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool beat Palace, one game from title
